name: Escape The Rooms:The Room Escape Of Wooden House
name_original: Escape The Rooms:The Room Escape Of Wooden House
description:
You found a huge treasure in an ancient cave, but the bad guys locked you in a house and wanted to monopolize the treasures you found.

Quickly escape the room and grab the treasure you found!

* Exquisite Graphics
* Clever puzzles
* From easy to difficult, suitable for all players
